name: Project Princess
description:
Project Princess was developed in a two-week sprint in 2016 by 4 very talented developers for the USC Games Summer Program and was the culmination of a 4-week class teaching young students who might be interested in game development, the basics of design, and game maker for prototyping. As such this was made while we  were in high school and no longer reflects our skill levels as they currently stand!

We put many hard hours into together and hope you can enjoy this rusty bucket of bolts from the past! <3

The .ZIP includes a .pptx for our presentation as well as the source code if you are interested in that...
